name: Kung Fu Glory Fighting Game
description:
Kung Fu Glory is a cross platform, action packed game with Single and Multiplayer combat modes.

  • Engage in gruesome combats with various enemies to complete 6 challenging levels in single player mode.
  • Challenge your friends for a fight or engage in fight with a random opponent in multiplayer mode.
  • Customize your fighter by configuring the combo moves and adding stamina, agility, and fighting power packs.
  • Unlock achievements and compete with your friends for high scores.

Choose from Ben, Sofia, Chao, Monk, Jesse, Robo, Samurai, or Sensei and give a unique name to your fighter. Win multiplayer fights and collect coins. Utilize your coins to unlock fighters and power packs. Configure the moves for your fighter to deliver deadly blows to the enemies during a fight.

Features:

  • Multiplayer Mode: Engage in combats with fighters across the globe
  • Customize Fighters: Choose from 8 awesome fighters and configure their stamina, agility, and fighting power
  • Combo Moves: Customize 6 deadly moves using 12 unique karate moves
  • Challenging Levels: Complete 6 levels to become a Kung Fu Master
  • Google Play Games Integration: Check out Achievements and Leaderboards within your social circle

Controls:

  • Single button click for High Kick, Low Kick, High Punch, and Low Punch
  • Combo button + any Punch / Kick button to initiate a combo move
  • Joystick like control for smooth movement
  • Toggle between different camera angles
  • Pause and Resume the fight

Note:

  • Internet connectivity is required to engage in fights with friends or random opponents
  • This game has been optimized for both phone and tablet
  • This free version has advertisements. Buying any pack of coins will remove advertisements.

If you love street fighting game, kung fu fighting game, karate, kickboxing or mortal kombat genres then you would love this game!

Get ready to reclaim your Kung Fu Glory!
